name: vly.ai
headline: Automating the full-stack developer
description: vly.ai completely replaces the full-stack developer for companies. We combine the highest-ranking swe-bench agent with a no-code platform to eliminate the developer layer and automate the deployment, hosting, & scaling of production applications.

## Our streamlined process 
### Expert-driven Development
Professionals guide you through the process
[Learn more](https://vly.ai/</#book-demo>)
### End-to-end Automation
Humans plan, test, & verify all automations used
[Schedule Call](https://vly.ai/</#book-demo>)
### Visual Interface
Understand the inner workings & verify specific logic
[Book Demo](https://vly.ai/</#book-demo>)
### No-code Platform
Make changes instantly, without a human, just by clicking on an element and describing changes
[See More](https://vly.ai/</#book-demo>)
## How a customer is saving over $200,000 with vly.ai
Pivot Robotics (YC W24) needed a web platform for their manufacturing clients to visually interface with their processing systems.
### Instead of hiring an agency, vly.ai was chosen, and an MVP was shipped the next day
The delivered demo was then used to sell to more customers, in a time-frame not traditionally possible.
[View Company](https://vly.ai/<https:/www.pivotrobotics.com/>)
![Pivot Robotics](https://vly.ai/_next/static/media/pivot.24cc18d9.gif)
## Key customer results
### 90% Faster Delivery
Decreased delivery time compared to traditional agencies
### $200,000 saved
Over six-figures saved across a 5 year timeline
### 10x Faster Iteration
Changes delivered instantly with our no-code platform
> "vly.ai helps us rapidly iterate on customer-facing web software at a fraction of the cost and time."- Siddarth Girdhar, CEO @ Pivot Robotics (YC W24)[Book a demo](https://vly.ai/</#book-demo>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: vly.ai**

**Founded**: 2024  
**Location**: San Francisco, CA  
**Team Size**: 2 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch**: F24  

**Mission**: vly.ai is on a clear mission to automate the full-stack developer process, aiming to fundamentally alter how companies approach software development.

**What They Do**: Initially conceived to completely replace full-stack developers, vly.ai has created a no-code platform that merges a highly effective software engineering (swe-bench) agent with advanced automation features. Their system handles deployment, hosting, and scaling of production applications, which can significantly reduce the time and cost associated with traditional software development approaches.

**Key Features**:
- **Expert-driven Development**: Industry professionals guide clients through the development process.
- **End-to-End Automation**: Every automation aspect is planned, tested, and verified by humans.
- **Visual Interface**: Users can visually comprehend and confirm application logic.
- **No-Code Platform**: Changes can be made dynamically by simply clicking and describing what needs to be adjusted‚Äîno coding required.

**Client Success Stories**: One notable example is Pivot Robotics, a fellow Y Combinator startup, which saved over $200,000 by using vly.ai instead of traditional agencies. vly.ai delivered a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) swiftly, enabling Pivot Robotics to attract more customers faster than usual.

### Customer Outcomes:
- **90% Faster Delivery**: Enhanced delivery timelines compared to conventional agencies.
- **Significant Cost Savings**: Clients have reported savings upwards of $200,000 over five years.
- **Rapid Iterations**: A tenfold increase in the speed of iteration thanks to their no-code capabilities.

**Contrasting with Traditional Agencies**:
- Instead of high hourly fees and extended timelines typical of conventional consulting firms, vly.ai operates on a flat monthly fee model that is significantly lower in cost and prioritizes rapid delivery. This radically different approach minimizes risks and highlights a strong understanding of the client's codebase through app visualization.

**Conclusion**: For companies in need of bespoke applications but lacking technical expertise, vly.ai offers a groundbreaking solution. By leveraging their no-code platform, businesses can empower their teams, accelerate development cycles, and cut down on costs‚Äîall while minimizing the need for traditional developers.

**Website**: Learn more and book a demo at [vly.ai](https://vly.ai).
